name: Sourcebot
short_desc: Self-hosted tool that helps developers and agents understand your codebase.
author: https://sourcebot.dev
description: Sourcebot is a self-hosted tool that helps you understand your codebase. Ask Sourcebot: Ask questions about your codebase and have Sourcebot provide detailed answers grounded with inline citations. Code search: Search and navigate across all your repos and branches, no matter where they're hosted.

form_fields.label: OpenAI API Key
form_fields.description: Optional: Required for Sourcebot's AI features
form_fields.hint: Optional. Enables AI features in Sourcebot.

form_fields.label: Anthropic API Key
form_fields.description: Optional: Used for Sourcebot's AI features
form_fields.hint: Optional. Enables AI features in Sourcebot.

form_fields.label: GitHub Token
form_fields.description: Optional: Required for Sourcebot to access private repositories or avoid rate limits

form_fields.label: GitHub App ID
form_fields.description: Optional: Required for GitHub App connection
form_fields.hint: Optional. The ID of your GitHub App.

form_fields.label: GitHub App Private Key
form_fields.description: Optional: Required for GitHub App connection. Paste the full private key including BEGIN/END lines.
form_fields.hint: Optional. The private key of your GitHub App.
